title: GFlowCausal: Generative Flow Networks for Causal Discovery. (arXiv:2210.08185v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: Causal discovery aims to uncover causal structure among a set of variables. Score-based approaches mainly focus on searching for the best Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) based on a predefined score function. However, most of them are not applicable on a large scale due to the limited searchability. Inspired by the active learning in generative flow networks, we propose a novel approach to learning a DAG from observational data called GFlowCausal. It converts the graph search problem to a generation problem, in which direct edges are added gradually. GFlowCausal aims to learn the best policy to generate high-reward DAGs by sequential actions with probabilities proportional to predefined rewards. We propose a plug-and-play module based on transitive closure to ensure efficient sampling. Theoretical analysis shows that this module could guarantee acyclicity properties effectively and the consistency between final states and fully-connected graphs. ret.translated_title: GFlowCausal：用于因果发现的生成流网络
ret.translated_abstract: 因果发现旨在揭示一组变量之间的因果结构。 基于得分的方法主要集中在基于预定义的得分函数搜索最佳有向无环图（DAG）。 但是，由于搜索能力有限，大多数方法都不适用于大规模数据。 受生成式流网络中的主动学习启发，我们提出了一种称为GFlowCausal的学习DAG的新方法。 它将图搜索问题转换为生成问题，其中逐步添加直接边。 GFlowCausal旨在通过与预定义奖励成比例的概率的顺序动作来学习生成高奖励DAG的最佳策略。 我们提出了一个基于传递闭包的即插即用模块来确保有效的抽样。 理论分析表明，该模块可以有效地保证无环特性和最终状态与完全连接图之间的一致性。 我们在合成和真实数据集上进行了广泛的实验
ret.tldr: GFlowCausal是一种新的方法，用于从观测数据中学习DAG。 它将图搜索问题转换为生成问题，并通过顺序动作和预定义奖励学习生成高奖励DAG的最佳策略。 我们提出了一个基于传递闭包的模块来确保有效的抽样，理论分析证明了该模块可以有效地保证无环特性和最终状态与完全连接图之间的一致性。 我们的实验表明，GFlowCausal可以在合成和真实数据集上表现出色。
